thread.section_title: Driver Support Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Driver Support | driversupport.com
thread.title: Kathleen Broughton
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Kathleen Broughton

author: Kathleen Broughton
title: Kathleen Broughton
text: I like the way the drivers were updated after the scan ran and how Driver Support optimizes your device and its components. The one thing that I don't like is that it didn't optimize my System hard drive. The System hard drive is still 56% fragmented. Also, the customer support is great! My computer is running better. I would recommend Driver Support with Active Optimization to everyone.
